Package com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF

Class Bus

java.lang.Object
com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.dbjson.Serializable
com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.Bus
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Serializable>
public class Bus extends Serializable
The Bus class represents a bus with various attributes such as name, facilities, price, capacity, departure and arrival stations, bus type, and schedules. It extends the Serializable class for serialization purposes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
RaihanMuhammadIhsan

      Adds a schedule to the list of schedules for the bus.
      Parameters:

      Throws:
